member.name: T:Data.Model.Idea
member.summary: This class is the structure of the table "Idea" in the database. It has an auto incremented id, a two foreign keys: UserId that references table "Users" and IdeaTypeId, referencing table "IdeaType". It also has the property IdeaText that saves the text of the idea.

member.name: T:Data.Model.User
member.summary: This class is the structure of the table "Users" in the database. It has an auto incremented id and a username.

member.name: T:Data.UserIdeaContext
member.summary: This class maps the classes we have in the folder "Model" into the tables of the database.
